description: The Czech Republic and the Netherlands are the latest to impose stricter rules.
title: Coronavirus: Europe tightens measures amid sharp rise in cases
title_page: Coronavirus: Europe tightens measures amid sharp rise in cases - BBC News
maintext: Mr Hamacek has been among those calling for a full lockdown; the new rules have instead been described as "soft lockdown". But will they be enough? The sense amongst those who must obey them is no. And if this is not enough, and Mr Hamacek's warning of "mobile morgues in car parks" becomes true, who is to blame?
